org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.explorationrate

Class LinearEpsilonDecay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.explorationrate.EpsilonDecayer
      • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.policy.explorationrate.LinearEpsilonDecay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AgentObserver, Learner, EpsilonCalculator

    public class LinearEpsilonDecay
extends EpsilonDecayer
    Author:
    Thomas Wanschik EpsiolonCalculator deacreasing exploration after every n steps / epsisodes in a linear way i.e. epsilon -= decreaseRate;
    See Also:
